Tesla - Master of Lightning - PBS - 2000
Science / Physics
   
The work of the eccentric inventor Nikola Tesla is fundamental to the way Americans live in the 20th century. His experiments paved the way for radio, neon and fluorescent lights, remote controls, and a better understanding of the electricity itself. It was not easy for Tesla to be the innovator he was, he was met with opposition from heavyweights such as JP Morgan and Thomas Edison. But the support of Mark Twain and others brought Tesla through trauma and the canon of great men American idea.

Tesla - Master of Lightning is the only version (at least so far) that was made expecificamente on the life and reign of this tremendous genius forgotten by history.

Is obviously not the only documentary that speaks of him, but this title is the only one who iram find. May also see Nikola.Tesla .-. The.Genius.Who.Lit.The.World. [UFO] [by.Aries], but there is still no subtitles.
